functions.tag: {pages:['{"text":"I haven\'t the time to compile my thoughts here in a manner I would like. These findings could put a target on my back.\\n\\nIt\'s about the Words. The words we can\'t remember."}','["",{"text":"We say them all the time, don\'t we? We\'re enchanters. It\'s our job. But its"},{"text":" not really us","strikethrough":true},{"text":" more like a controlled chaos, in a way. A call to the stars.\\n\\nEven our breakthroughs with the Codex have essentially\\n ","color":"reset"}]','["",{"text":"been controlled mutations. A repeatable experiment, sure, but far from real control.\\n\\nBut this language the Doctrine are using? It\'s unlike anything I\'ve seen. And you can "},{"text":"remember","italic":true},{"text":" it. Write your way to what you want.\\n ","color":"reset"}]','{"text":"But if they find out I know about it, well.
